Package: gov.noaa.messageapi.conditions

[Java] Class BaseCondition

    • gov.noaa.messageapi.conditions.BaseCondition

    • The base class for conditions. Every condition holds an id, a type, and an operator. The id is used for unique identification of the condition during processing and validation, the type is either composite or comparison, and the operator depends on type ('and' or 'or' for composites, arbitrary for comparisons (default set is <,>,=,/=,<=,>=)).

      Authors:
      Ryan Berkheimer

      • Constructor Detail

        • public BaseCondition(java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.Object> conditionMap)

          Constructor for building a condition from a map. This is generally used during session bootstrapping.

          Parameters:
          conditionMap - A map holding the id, type, and operator for a condition.

        • public BaseCondition(ICondition condition)

          Copy constructor for creating a new condition from an existing condition. Used in immutable processing of records.

          Parameters:
          condition - The original condition to copy.
